Text:
You don't have S04E11 in this.

Does anybody know how many episodes season 4 will include? I can't find this info anywhere.

Sorry...just noticed the "so far" in your notes. :-) 

Still keen to know if 11 is it for this season...this info is usually in wikipedia or imdb, but I can't seem to find it.
samhefron: there are 16 episodes in the 4 season, checkout this link for more info http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0934814/episodes#season-4
you're both wrong. there will be 24 episodes in the 4th season. says it pretty clearly on wikipedia
I know, that is what they say on chuckonline.net, but you are right, wikipedia also gives this info. And lucky for us that there will be 24 ep instead of 16!
Hi, I forgot to write so far in the description and when I were going to change it, it says EDIT: Temporary Disabled. that's why sorry guys :)

This is a great torrent, so I'll seed for at least a month! Thanks for uploading, Scottboard! :)
V 8
A 9

Thanks.

I know this will seem CRAZY, but it's best not to write "complete" or "Season 1-4" when it doesn't really have the rest of season 4 included.  Better to call it Season 1-3 complete ++
Yeah i know, but it was the complete season at the moment i made it, the show had a break over christmas so it wouldn't be a new episode until the 17'th of january, i made it in november i think.

So far, episode one was corrupted, VLC repaired the file, but it took forever and even then, the episode skipped a lot and the repair did not stick/save.  Don't want to watch episode two until I can see all of episode one, so I have no idea if any of the other files work.  Not going to seed this since it does not appear to be working properly.
Episode one is working perfectly for me, and I've not anyone else with this problem, maybe it's just you? Well anyway, the others are flawless. It's a shame that you wont seed..
Guys/Girls please increase the uploading bandwidth...Seeds are many but the speed is totally fucked up!!!
guys speed is rlly at a snail's speed.....uploading speed needs to be increased....need ur help...
guys pls increase ur uploading bandwidth....speed is totally fucked up....
